items.sentence: Everybody in the lobby is waiting to talk to Tom.
Everything is costing more than it did last year.
Everywhere you look you can see children playing.
Tom woke up the next day with a painful headache.
Tom wondered whether Mary knew anything about it.
We left early in the morning before it got light.
We must be careful that this never happens again.
She acknowledged that she couldn\'t speak French.
As far as I know, Tom doesn\'t have a girlfriend.
As far as I know, such a function doesn\'t exist.
